017
018package org.tquadrat.shootingtimer;
019
020import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil.loadResourceBundle;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil.retrieveText;
022import static org.tquadrat.shootingtimer.Main.BASE_BUNDLE_NAME;
023import static org.tquadrat.shootingtimer.Main.MSG_CannotLoadTextResources;
024
025import java.util.MissingResourceException;
026import java.util.ResourceBundle;
027
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Text;
029import org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Translation;
030
031/**
032 *  The system status.
033 *
034 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
035 */
036public enum Status
037{
038        /*------------------*\
039    ====** Enum Declaration **=================================================
040        \*------------------*/
041    /**
042     *  The system is in the OFF state, as for a reset.
043     */
044    @Text
045    (
046        description = "Status off",
047        translations =
048            {
049                @Translation( language="de", text = "Inaktiv" ),
050                @Translation( language="en", text = "Off" )
051            }
052    )
053    STATUS_OFF,
054
055    /**
056     *  The system is starting a heat.
057     */
058    @Text
059        (
060            description = "Status Starting",
061            translations =
062                {
063                    @Translation( language="de", text = "Start" ),
064                    @Translation( language="en", text = "Start" )
065                }
066        )
067    STATUS_STARTING,
068
069    /**
070     *  The system is in the status before the prolog: no light is on.
071     */
072    @Text
073        (
074            description = "Status before",
075            translations =
076                {
077                    @Translation( language="de", text = "Vorlauf" ),
078                    @Translation( language="en", text = "Before" )
079                }
080        )
081    STATUS_BEFORE,
082
083    /**
084     *  The system is in the prolog status: the red light is on.
085     */
086    @Text
087    (
088        description = "Status Prolog",
089        translations =
090            {
091                @Translation( language="de", text = "Bereit" ),
092                @Translation( language="en", text = "Ready" )
093            }
094    )
095    STATUS_PROLOG,
096
097    /**
098     *  The system is in the shooting status: the green light is on.
099     */
100    @Text
101    (
102        description = "Status Shooting",
103        translations =
104            {
105                @Translation( language="de", text = "SchieÃen" ),
106                @Translation( language="en", text = "Shoot" )
107            }
108    )
109    STATUS_SHOOTING,
110
111    /**
112     *  The system is in the after status: again, no light is on.
113     */
114    @Text
115    (
116        description = "Status after",
117        translations =
118            {
119                @Translation( language="de", text = "Nachlauf" ),
120                @Translation( language="en", text = "Backlash" )
121            }
122    )
123    STATUS_AFTER;
124
125        /*------------------------*\
126    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
127        \*------------------------*/
128    /**
129     *  The resource bundle with the names.
130     */
131    private final static ResourceBundle m_ResourceBundle;
132
133    static
134    {
135        try
136        {
137            //---* Load the resource bundle with the texts *-------------------
138            m_ResourceBundle = loadResourceBundle( BASE_BUNDLE_NAME )
139                .orElseThrow( () -> new MissingResourceException( MSG_CannotLoadTextResources, BASE_BUNDLE_NAME, null ) );
140        }
141        catch( final MissingResourceException e )
142        {
143            throw new ExceptionInInitializerError( e );
144        }
145    }
146
147        /*---------*\
148    ====** Methods **==========================================================
149        \*---------*/
150    /**
151     *  {@inheritDoc}
152     *
153     *  @see Enum#toString()
154     */
155    @Override
156    public final String toString()
157    {
158        final var retValue = retrieveText( m_ResourceBundle, this );
159
160        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
161        return retValue;
162    }   //  toString()
163}
164//  class Status
165
166/*
167 *  End of File
168 */
